function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resumption of funding to pre-pandemic levels cannot be guaranteed due to global financial downturns","Impact":"Loss of livelihoods, local infrastructure, skilled researchers, and trust between conservation agencies and local communities","Mitigation":"Diversify funding sources, secure long-term commitments, and maintain continuous communication and physical presence","Technologies":"Financial risk management tools, communication platforms","People":"Conservation agencies, local communities","Owner":"Conservation agencies, government, philanthropic organizations"},{"Description":"Rushed government measures or societal backlash may harm conservation efforts","Impact":"Negative consequences for the local persistence of species and their habitats","Mitigation":"Evidence-based policy making, community engagement, and public education","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, communication platforms, educational resources","People":"Conservation agencies, local communities, government","Owner":"Conservation agencies, government, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Biodiversity changes associated with global human confinement and pandemic-related societal and behavioral changes","Impact":"Severe and wide-ranging impacts on biodiversity conservation","Mitigation":"Adaptation of conservation strategies, monitoring of biodiversity changes, and public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Biodiversity monitoring tools, data analysis tools, public communication platforms","People":"Conservation agencies, researchers, general public","Owner":"Conservation agencies, government, research institutions"}]}
